definitions.text: an executive officer of a firm or corporation
the person who holds the office of head of state of the United States government
examples: the President likes to jog every morning

definitions.text: the chief executive of a republic
the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization
examples: address your remarks to the chairperson

definitions.text: the head administrative officer of a college or university
the office of the United States head of state
examples: a President is elected every four years
